statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); BG_LIGHT_BLUE="69"; BG_DARK_BLUE="60"; BG_DARKEST_BLUE="236"; FG_WHITE="231"; FG_BLUE="111"; FG_LIGHT_GRAY="146"; output=""; dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); case "$dir_name" in Documents) dir_display="  ";; Downloads) dir_display="  ";; Music) dir_display="  ";; Pictures) dir_display="  ";; *) dir_display="$dir_name";; esac; output+=$(printf '\033[48;5;%sm\033[38;5;%sm  %s \033[0m' "$BG_LIGHT_BLUE" "$FG_WHITE" "$dir_display"); if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ] || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || true; branch=$(git -c gc.autoDetach=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_status_text=""; git -c gc.autoDetach=false diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null || git_status_text="${git_status_text}*"; [ -n "$(git -c gc.autoDetach=false ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ] && git_status_text="${git_status_text}?"; git -c gc.autoDetach=false diff-index --quiet --cached HEAD -- 2>/dev/null || git_status_text="${git_status_text}+"; output+=$(printf '\033[48;5;%sm\033[38;5;%sm  %s' "$BG_DARK_BLUE" "$FG_BLUE" "$branch"); [ -n "$git_status_text" ] && output+=$(printf ' %s' "$git_status_text"); output+=$(printf ' \033[0m'); fi; fi; time_str=$(date "+%T, %a %d/%h"); output+=$(printf '\033[48;5;%sm\033[38;5;%sm   %s \033[0m' "$BG_DARKEST_BLUE" "$FG_LIGHT_GRAY" "$time_str"); printf '%s' "$output"
